long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DexTrade is a non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet with advanced security features, including multisignature (multisig) and MPC (Multiparty Computation) support. It seamlessly integrates with popular decentralized exchanges (DEXs) and empowers you with cross-chain, self-custodian, peer-to-peer (P2P) trading capabilities.

Key Features:

Non-Custodial Security: DexTrade ensures your assets remain under your control. It's a non-custodial wallet, meaning you have exclusive control over your private keys and funds.

Multisignature (Multisig) Support: Enhance your wallet's security with multisig technology, requiring multiple approvals for transactions. Your assets are safer than ever.

Multiparty Computation (MPC): DexTrade employs MPC for advanced security, safeguarding your assets from potential threats.

DEX Integration: Enjoy seamless access to popular decentralized exchanges. Trade a wide range of cryptocurrencies directly from your wallet.

Cross-Chain Compatibility: DexTrade allows you to trade assets across different blockchain networks. Swap tokens across chains effortlessly.

Peer-to-Peer (P2P) Trading: DexTrade's self-custodian P2P platform enables secure, direct trading with other users.

Why Choose DexTrade:

Ultimate Security: Your assets are never held by a third party. DexTrade prioritizes security with non-custodial, multisig, and MPC support.

DEX Integration: Trade on popular DEXs with ease, all from your wallet.

Cross-Chain Freedom: Explore a world of opportunities with cross-chain trading capabilities.

P2P Convenience: Enjoy secure, direct trading with other users on our self-custodian P2P platform.

Discover the future of cryptocurrency trading with DexTrade. Your assets, your control. Join us today.

This revised description focuses on the core strengths of DexTrade, emphasizing its non-custodial nature, advanced security features, DEX integration, cross-chain compatibility, and self-custodian P2P trading. It provides a clear and concise overview of what users can expect from your extension.
